ORIGIN._$: S. Bieg and coworkers (1998) generated a congenic line in which diabetes and lymphopenia are controlled solely by Iddm 1. This strain was generated by nine cycles of cross-intercross breeding of diabetes-prone DP with DR BB rats. Iddm 1 in the BioBreeding (BB) rat designates the genomic region on rat Chromosome (Chr) 4 that harbors the gene causing peripheral T cell lymphopenia (Lyp) and diabetes. The average age of onset of diabetes was 85 ± 53 days of age after the first and 67 ± 10 days of age after the 9th cycle.
